channel.title: Hacking on Imageless Thought
channel.description: Recent content in Hacking on Imageless Thought

item.title: FlipperZero: A PenTest Tool
item.description: Flipper Zero is a portable multi-tool for pentesters and geeks in a toy-like body. Used to pentest digital services, such as radio protocols, access control systems, hardware, and more. It’s fully open-source and customizable, so you can extend it in whatever way you like.
